mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( user_id, caption, place ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{caption}, #{place} ) RETURNING post_id
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.caption, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.likes_count, p.comments_count, p.place, COALESCE(l.liked_at IS NOT NULL, false) as liked, l.liked_at, m.media_id, m.media_url, m.media_type FROM posts p LEFT JOIN post_likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id and p.user_id = l.user_id LEFT JOIN post_media m ON p.post_id = m.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}

WITH SelectedPosts AS ( SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, p.caption, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.likes_count, p.comments_count, p.place, COALESCE(l.liked_at IS NOT NULL, false) as liked, l.liked_at FROM posts p LEFT JOIN post_likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id and p.user_id = l.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at OFFSET (#{page}-1)*#{size} FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS only ) SELECT p.*, m.media_id, m.media_url, m.media_type FROM SelectedPosts p LEFT JOIN post_media m ON p.post_id = m.post_id ORDER BY p.created_at
